snippet: No racer has made a career change so drastic, and so successfully, as John Surtees, who followed his run as a seven-time world champion on two wheels with a rise to the pinnacle of Grand Prix racing.
abstract: John Surtees, seven-time world motorcycle racing champion and winner of 1964 Grand Prix automobile championship, says television has been the biggest motivator for improvements in racing safety by enabling teams to have the budgets needed to develop advanced technology.
lead_paragraph: No racer has made a career change so drastic, and so successfully, as John Surtees, who followed his run as a seven-time world champion on two wheels with a rise to the pinnacle of Grand Prix racing.
